name: Galaxy Defender (itch) (Press Space)
description:
Galaxy Defender was apart of my final term coursework which I created in 1 week. I had so much fun working on it, I decided to turn it into a proper game. I hope you enjoy!

Please let me know if you find any bugs, I'm always striving to better my code. Any info would be greatly appreciated!

Josh  <3

Audio in order of appearance

Menu theme: https://freesound.org/people/rhodesmas/sounds/321901/

Battle theme: https://freesound.org/people/Sirkoto51/sounds/414214/

Defeat theme: https://freesound.org/people/jivatma07/sounds/173859/

Many thanks to Rhodesmas, Sirkoto51 and jivatma07 for allowing me to include their amazing soundscapes in my game.

Some visual assets by: www.kenney.nl
